### Summary

The netcdf-cxx package configuration is quite different from netcdf-fortran, although both are from the same organization and build on the same netcdf-c library. The netcdf-fortran package seems to be maintained and used more, therefore I am suggesting to align the netcdf-cxx4 package (default options etc.) with the netcdf-fortran package.

### Rationale

Being consistent in how options/variants are named and what the default is makes it easier for developers and users.

### Description

The idea is to adopt the defaults from netcdf-fortran and apply them to netcdf-cxx4, where applicable.

### Additional information

> spack --version
0.17.1-1369-c8e170b862

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Make netcdf-cxx4 package config inconsistent with netcdf-fortran package config
